item.title: HSBC’s French Life Insurer Said to Attract BNP, BPCE Interest
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BNP Paribas SA, BPCE SA and Matmut are among firms considering bids for HSBC Holdings Plc’s French life insurance business, according to people familiar with the matter. Non-binding bids for the business are expected by the end of October, the people said, asking not to be identified ...

item.title: ECB’s Kazimir Says December’s Rate Meeting Is Wide Open
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The European Central Bank remains flexible going into its final meeting of 2024, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir, who said disinflation is on a “solid footing” and more cuts in borrowing costs are possible. “Our decision to lower rates in October leaves the Decembe...

item.title: ECB’s Simkus Says It’s Clear That Rates Will Be Lowered Further
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said borrowing costs will be reduced further should the downtrend in inflation persist, though he wouldn’t predict the outcome of officials’ next meeting. “The direction is clear — less restrictive monetary policy,” the L...

item.title: UBS Bankers Under Pressure From Lawyers to Rethink ESG Labels
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS Group AG is asking its bankers to rethink the way they discuss some sustainable products in public following advice from its lawyers, according to people familiar with the matter. The development affects the kind of language bankers are free to use when presenting a whole array of...

item.title: UBS gibt Swisscard-Anteile ab

item.title: Swisscard wird ganz von Amex übernommen - UBS steigt aus
item.author: cash.ch
item.description: Eine Änderung hatte sich bereits im Sommer abgezeichnet.
